Text: I can't see any files when I open the ISO file. Does anyone else have this problem and is there a way to solve it?

Ah, I've got it. It doesn't work just mounting the file with deamon tool. I had to use Qwix in order to extract the iso file, and now I can copy the folders to my xbox.
